p: The germination rate of Pueraria seeds was significantly lower than for Mikania seeds, especially under light conditions (Table 1). However, sulfuric acid treatment significantly improved both the germination rate and germination index of Pueraria seeds. Pueraria seeds (treated by H 2SO 4) germinated between 5.05 and 11.05 times faster than those of Mikania. The germination of Pueraria seeds was not affected by the light. Conversely, the germination rate and germination speed of Mikania were lower under the dark than under light conditions (Table 1).
